articles.description: Tamil playback singer Uma Ramanan, 72, passes away in Chennai. Survived by singer-husband AV Ramanan and son Vignesh Ramanan.
articles.content:
Renowned playback singer Uma Ramanan, who predominantly sang in Tamil, passed away at 72 in Chennai on Wednesday. She is survived by her singer-husband AV Ramanan and her son, Vignesh Ramanan.
 Indi… [+1110 chars]

articles.title: Anupamaa Serial spoiler: Anuj strongly reprimands Aadhya for badmouthing Anu; 'Aapki nafrat, aapka gussa jaya - Bollywood Life
articles.description: In Rupali Ganguly, Gaurav Khanna starrer TV show Anupamaa, we will see Aadhya bickering and complaining about Anu to Shruti. Anuj will defend Anupamaa.
articles.content: Anupamaa spoiler alert 2nd May: In Rupali Ganguly, Gaurav Khanna starrer top TV show, Anupamaa, we see that Anu has moved in with Anuj and Aadhya and Shruti. Aadhya has been suffering from panic atta… [+2666 chars]

articles.title: Ankita Lokhande REJECTS Karan Johar's Student Of The Year 3, Know Why | Exclusive - News18
articles.description: Student Of The Year 3 will not be a film but a web series. In April, Karan Johar had confirmed the same during the Cinevesture International Film Festival (CIFF) in Chandigarh.
articles.content: After her successful stint in Bigg Boss 17, Ankita Lokhande is on a success spree. News18 Showsha has exclusively learnt that the actress was recently offered Karan Johars Student Of The Year 3. Howe… [+2037 chars]

articles.title: “Distortion Of Truth” — Min Hee Jin Hits Back At HYBE's Accusations Of Planned Termination Of NewJeans' Contracts - Koreaboo
articles.description: ADOR releases a counter-statement against HYBE’s claims that Min Hee Jin tried to request for termination rights to steal management power.
articles.content: Earlier on May 2, 2024, it was reported that ADOR CEO Min Hee Jin had allegedly asked for the rights to terminate NewJeans contract unilaterally, without the need to go through HYBE. Reports indicate… [+1593 chars]
